name: TempMonitor
short_description: Application was designed for visualization of measurement flow. Measurements should been taken from Melexis mlx90614 contactless temperature sensor by Arduino_Uno_Rev.3 board and then by means of serial port connection sended to PC. Application simply listen appropriate COM port and visualize measurements. You can find a sketch for the Arduino board on project homepage.
summary: A simple Qt-based visualizator for measurement flow
